summary: E-commerce website with admin dashboard for product management
architectural_notes: Product management system (add, edit, delete products)

existing_features.title: Design and implement a new visual theme for the website with a distinct aesthetic that differs from the current warm earth tones, including updated color palette, typography, spacing, and component styling
Update the product catalog page layout and structure to improve visual appeal and user experience while maintaining all existing functionality (viewing products, adding to cart)
Redesign the admin dashboard interface including the products management page and orders page to improve usability and visual consistency with the new theme
Update the checkout and order confirmation pages to match the new interface design while preserving all existing functionality
